properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 29 at 4:18AM PST until March 1 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Western Mojave Desert.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult, especially
for high profile vehicles. Visibility could be reduced at times
due to blowing dusts and sand. Unsecured objects could get blown
around. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages
may result.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Watch for areas of reduced visibility due to
blowing sand and dust. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM PST SUNDAY
